{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$15.1M in 2021-2022** on contracts with GROUPE ROBERT.

Across 2 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 1 have at least one amendment (50%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 3% and the average number of amendments was 1. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$838.6K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.44 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$15.2M. The longest contract was 2 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$30.3M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
